name: Z-Soulsilver Caliber
effect: Ignores defense. Reduce the targets Defense and Special Defense by 1. Roll 4 chance die to inflict Drowsy.
description: Pheo loads his Z Ghost-Crystal into his rifle, taking aim and firing. Like a cloud streaking through the sky, the spectral bullet inflicts no pain yet shreds the targets focus and fortitude, leaving them in a constant state of daydreaming that makes it hard to defend from physical and mental attacks.
